name: Miyuki
introduction: Princess of the Consortium, Team Anger Reduction
description: Phoenix's Director of Asia and the heir of the Soga family. She was born at the top of the world and remains so. Her business acumen is off the charts, but she is carefree and loves to try out new things.

passiveSkill.name: Commercial Strength
passiveSkill.description: All of Miyuki's attacks decrease target's Rage by an additional 330. ${d.lens5.skill}

uniqueSkill.name: Fortune Caller
uniqueSkill.description: Attacks all enemies and deals ATK*215% ${d.awakening.skill ? d.awakening.skill : d.lens4.skill} damage.

specialSkill.name: Heaven's Blessing
specialSkill.description: Miyuki summons a gigantic fan to attack enemies in one column, dealing 120% damage. ${d.lens6.skill} ${d.lens6.attribute}

normalSkill.name: Hurl
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK*105% damage.

templateData.lens6.skill: Increases DEF Penetration by 30% when attacking.
templateData.awakening.attribute: Increase DMG Rate and DMG RES Rate by 10%.
